title: Poorman2
author: Poorman2
content: 2023 saal se Ethereum ka price andar 20000 USD ja sakta hai, ORye fir 1850 USD k aas pass rehga.

comments.author: Jack051
comments.body: I mean abhi ETH 1834 doller hai, toh so it can easily touch 20000 doller and also ye all time high ko breck kar sakta hai.

comments.author: ahamed
comments.body: I expect ETH to rise to 20000+ in future, currently it is a bit low, after some time it may skyrocket, may come down again depends on the future market.

comments.author: welovedcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Jack051 on May 27, 2023, 05:22:57 AMI mean abhi ETH 1834 doller hai, toh so it can easily touch 20000 doller and also ye all time high ko breck kar sakta hai.Bhai 20,000 aur 2000 me bahut fark he thoda zero sambhal ke to use karo.
